
debian_package_list.txt

Copyright (c) 2004-2005. Christian Heller and the CYBOP developers.

@author Dennis Reichenbach <dennis.reichenbach@gmx.net>
@author Christian Heller <christian.heller@tuxtax.de>

The following packages are sorted alphabetically.
Packages which are NOT implemented yet are put in brackets [].


cyboi.deb
- depends:      libc6, xlibs, libxml2, libxml2-dev (to compile the source code)
- recommends:   cybol-core
- suggests:     cyboi-doc
- category:     interpreters
- files:        /usr/bin/cyboi
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/README.Debian
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/changelog.gz
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/copyright
  	        /usr/share/man/man1/cyboi1.gz
		/usr/share/doc/cyboi/examples/exit/*
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/examples/exit_cybol_file/*
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/examples/exit_text_file/*
                /usr/share/doc/cyboi/examples/helloworld/*

[cyboi-doc.deb]
- recommends:   cybop-doc-papers, cybop-doc-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cyboi/manual.txt

[cybol-core.deb]
- depends:      cyboi
- suggests:     cybol-healthcare
- category:     misc (evtl. auch "lib")
- files:        /usr/share/cybol/core/*

[cybol-healthcare.deb]
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-core
- suggests:     resmedicinae
- category:     misc (evtl. auch "science"; "health" gibt's leider nicht)
- files:        /usr/share/cybol/healthcare/*

[resadmin.deb]
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-core
- category:     misc
- files:        /usr/share/resadmin/*

[resmedicinae.deb]
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-healthcare
- recommends:   resadmin
- suggests:     resmedicinae-doc
- category:     misc (evtl. auch "science"; "health" gibt's leider nicht)
- files:        /usr/share/resmedicinae/*

resmedicinae-doc.deb
(ACHTUNG! Dieses Paket gibt es schon in "Sarge", wo es aber "resmed-doc" heiszt.
Andreas Tille ist der Maintainer. Das Paket gehoert zum Meta-Package "med-doc".
Es sollte umbenannt werden in "resmedicinae-doc". Dazu bitte Kontakt aufnehmen!)
- recommends:   cyboi-doc
- suggests:     linuxdoc-tools
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/resmedicinae/analysis.txt
                /usr/share/doc/resmedicinae/manual.txt

cybop-doc-papers.deb
- suggests:     cyboi-doc
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cybop/papers/*

cybop-doc-presentations.deb
- suggests:     cyboi-doc
- category:     doc
- files:        /usr/share/doc/cybop/presentations/*
